thread.section_title: PartsGeek Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PartsGeek | www.partsgeek.com | 8 of 5982
thread.title: Adam Corley

author: Adam Corley
title: Adam Corley
text: Worst place ever for customer service !!! It's been 3 weeks and still havent got my part... Asked to refund my money and they didn't... The package is lost and untill they find , I can't get my money... When I do get the package in the mail the said return it and when they receive it THEN they can processes my refund! I had to spend more of my money an order it from local businesses and got it in 3 day..
